climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: Ergonomic handle is designed for all uses and is made from recycled materials
The 5 blade cartridge features ceramic coated blades for improved comfort and a lubricating strip with cocoa butter and aloe
Set includes one razor blade cartridge and one razor blade handle, replacement "Shave 5" cartridges are sold separately (type B019Y3686I into Amazon search bar for Shave 5 replacement blades)
For use by both women and men
Blades and >90% of handle made in USA; cartridge assembled in Mexico, never tested on animals

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Product, Bad Packaging
reviews.reviewText: I like the product but the quality of packaging stinks. I don’t know if it’s Amazon or the brand Preserve itself but it didn’t come with a blade cover and got cardboard all in the blade. For a new razor, I shouldn’t have to tweezer the cardboard out of a brand new razor in box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this brand and how it supports the environment!
reviews.reviewText: I must say, these razor replacements are nothing short of awesome! They deliver a smooth and close shave, leaving my skin feeling incredibly soft.The precision and durability of the blades are truly impressive, making the replacement process hassle-free. I've tried various brands before, but these stand out for their longevity and sharpness. Plus, they glide effortlessly, minimizing any chances of nicks or irritation.The value for money is exceptional, considering the quality of the shave they provide. Overall, these razor replacements have exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend them for a top-notch shaving experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All I use!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this razor with this particular refill pack for nearly four years now. I started during quarantine as something extra to save on. I still have the same handle!!Will not use anything else!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cruelty free and vegan and lasts for many uses
reviews.reviewText: This is the only razor I use tho shave everything that needs to be shaved. In my experience 5 blade razors irritate my skin less than other razor blades. I choose preserve in particular, because it's vegan and cruelty free. It does have a lubricating strip,but it doesn't last long. I get maybe 2 or 3 uses before the strip is dry. That doesn't bother me though as I prefer to use shaving cream and the blades themselves last long before they dull.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A sturdy little razor with better than average performance.
reviews.reviewText: All in all I am quite satisfied with this purchase. I saw quite a few reviews saying that the razor missed parts or skipped hairs. I'm not sure if that's true or not because while I did miss a few spots that had to be gone back over, they were the spots we ladies always miss shaving our legs - those awkward angles around the knees, near the ankle bone, etc. One thing to be noted is that I only got one use out of the moisturizer strip and then it was gone. That's the shortest life for a moisturizer strip any razor I've owned has had. That being said, it didn't inconvenience me too much because I generally use a shave oil anyway. It didn't give me any worse razor bumps than I already experience (KP sufferer here) and it felt sturdy when I was handling it. No nicks or cuts and no rust so far; I do follow the instructions and dry it lightly and store it outside of the shower to help prevent moisture from sitting on it. Overall, for an eco friendly razor at this price point I'd definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works As Intended
reviews.reviewText: Many years ago I ordered a Preserve razor from Amazon. I was tired of buying disposable razors and tossing them in the trash once the blade dulled, and then repurchasing. I didn't like the impact this had on the environment. I have used my Preserve razor continuously since then, and have purchased these refill blades as needed (which isn't very often). I'm very happy with the quality and will continue to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These razors are not only good for the environment but good for human bits and bobs too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This item is for a 5 blade Preserve razor. Great delivery time.
reviews.reviewText: The service was great and the item was exactly as expected. These razors are fantastic and you aren't putting disposable plastic razors in the landfill. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 12, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Long lasting. No nicking self. Stay in place. Very impressive.

reviews.reviewTitle: perfette per chi soffre di allergie
reviews.reviewText: ottimo per chi soffre di allergia al nickel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Lasts a decent time and a good ethos
reviews.reviewText: Super sharp blades so attention required when shaving but each one lasts a few months. I love the ethos of the company and will keep the razor for as long as usable.
I had been looking for an eco-friendly razor for a long time but I hated safety razors. Was so happy to found this one and I find it works just as well as the Venus razors I was using before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 13, 2019
